rows.label: tev000691_MSG0001
rows.name: Hey there, [ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0002
rows.name:
Lemme tell ya, I'm having one rough day over here.
I drink and I drink, but I can't get drunk![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0003
rows.name:
It's like I built up an immunity to Scotch—which is the
most terrible thing I've ever heard! I don't know what
I'm gonna do...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0004
rows.name:
What do you like to drink, [ST:playername ]?
Maybe I'll try your poison and see if it works.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0010
rows.name: Beer

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0011
rows.name: Suggest that Frye crack open a cold one.

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0020
rows.name: Cocktail

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0021
rows.name: Suggest that Frye try a fancy cocktail. With an umbrella.

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0030
rows.name: Wine

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0031
rows.name: Suggest that Frye try a fine, aged wine.

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0040
rows.name: Vodka

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0041
rows.name: Suggest a healthy belt of vodka.

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0050
rows.name: Sake

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0051
rows.name: Suggest a high-quality Japanese sake.

rows.label: tev000691_JNK0060
rows.name: Shrug

rows.label: tev000691_SEL0061
rows.name: Explain that you're still a minor, so you wouldn't know.

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0005
rows.name: Beer? Really? I dunno...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0006
rows.name:
I got a long-standing policy about beer—I only drink
it while watching football. And it's not like that's a
common occurrence nowadays.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0007
rows.name: But yeah, I guess I could give it a shot...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0008
rows.name:
Blech! Those foo-foo drinks are always so sweet!
Save it for a 21st birthday, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0009
rows.name: Still, I guess it never hurts to try something new...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0010
rows.name:
Hey, I ain't some fancy snob, ya know? I drink Scotch.
CHEAP Scotch. Wine's pretty much the opposite of that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0011
rows.name:
But maybe since it's so unlike what I usually drink,
it'll actually get me smashed! Worth a shot, I guess...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0012
rows.name:
That's not a bad idea. Not bad at all.
I didn't know you were a vodka[ST:gender p1= man p2= woman ]![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0013
rows.name:
Nice thing about vodka is that it's easy to get.
That'll be important if I end up making a habit of it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0014
rows.name:
Geez, no wonder you get along with Nagi so well.
You got pretty esoteric tastes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0015
rows.name:
I usually don't like to drink things I can't pronounce,
but if you really think I could develop a taste for it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0016
rows.name:
Oh, right! Riiight. I forgot you couldn't drink. Sorry.
...Er, don't call the law or nothing, okay?
Honest mistake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hey, you know what? Talking to you just gave me a
great idea![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0018
rows.name:
If I can't find a type of booze that'll get me properly
hammered, I should just make one myself! Moonshine!
White lightning! That's the ticket, all right![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0019
rows.name:
There's all sorts of weird fruits and grains and crap
here on Mira that we didn't have back on Earth, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0020
rows.name:
Next time I'm off on an Interceptor mission, I'll just
gather up a bunch and see if I can ferment 'em into
an entirely new type of drink.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0021
rows.name:
Man, I never thought I'd turn into one of those bathtub
distiller types. But I guess sobriety's the mother of
invention![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0022
rows.name: Thanks for talking me through that. I owe ya one.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0023
rows.name:
Still, I guess I better try the Scotch one more time
just to make sure it still ain't working. Then I'll start
drawing up plans for the distillery.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000691_MSG0024
rows.name: See ya next time duty calls, all right?[ST:wait ]
